name: UParameterizeMeshToolUVAtlasProperties
doc: Settings for the UVAtlas Automatic UV Generation Method

IslandStretch: Maximum amount of stretch, from none to unbounded. If zero stretch is specified, each triangle will likely be its own UV island.
NumIslands: Hint at number of UV islands. The default of 0 means it is determined automatically.
TextureResolution: Expected resolution of the output textures; this controls spacing left between UV islands to avoid interpolation artifacts.
bUsePolygroups: Generate new UVs based on polygroups from specified layer.
bLayoutUDIMPerPolygroup: Layout resulting islands on UDIMs based on polygroups.
